  • Method Details

    • verify

      boolean verify(org.jdom2.Document documento) throws Exception
      Verifies the given XML document.
      Parameters:
      documento - The document to be verified.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the document passed verification.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the verification process.

    • loadXMLDocument

      org.jdom2.Document loadXMLDocument(String xmlFilePath) throws org.jdom2.JDOMException, IOException
      Loads an XML document from the specified file path.
      Parameters:
      xmlFilePath - The path to the XML file to be loaded.
      Returns:
      A Document representing the loaded XML content.
      Throws:
      org.jdom2.JDOMException - If an error occurs while parsing the XML file.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.
